languages.text: {n}Женщина достает из голенища начищенного сапога небольшой сверток и протягивает вам.{/n} "Истинным драгоценностям место в руках достойнейших, шерин. Прошу, примите сей скромный дар". {n}Джай загадочно улыбается и пригубливает ароматный напиток.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Женщина достает из голенища начищенного сапога небольшой сверток и протягивает вам.{/n} "Драгоценным камням место в оправе перстней. Я — не перстень, шерин. Так, золотое колечко. Но вот вы..." {n}Джай загадочно улыбается и пригубливает ароматный напиток.{/n}

languages.text: {n}She reaches into her polished boot and produces a small package, which she offers to you.{/n} "True jewels are meant to be held in the hands of the worthiest, shereen. Please, accept this humble gift." {n}Jae smiles mysteriously and takes a sip of her fragrant drink.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Женщина достает из голенища начищенного сапога небольшой сверток и протягивает вам.{/n} "Истинным драгоценностям место в руках достойнейших, шерин. Прошу, примите сей скромный дар". {n}Джай загадочно улыбается и пригубливает ароматный напиток.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}She reaches into her polished boot and produces a small package, which she offers to you.{/n} "Every gemstone needs a setting. I'm no fancy ring, shereen. A tiny gold one at most. You, on the other hand..." {n}Jae smiles mysteriously and takes a sip of her fragrant drink.{/n}

{n}She reaches into her polished boot and produces a small package, which she offers to you.{/n} "Every gemstone needs a setting. I'm no fancy ring, shereen. A tiny gold one at most. You, on the other hand..." {n}Jae smiles mysteriously and takes a sip of her fragrant drink.{/n}

{n}She reaches into her polished boot and produces a small package, which she offers to you.{/n} "Every gemstone needs a setting. I'm no fancy ring, shereen. A tiny gold one at most. You, on the other hand..." {n}Jae smiles mysteriously and takes a sip of her fragrant drink.{/n}

{n}She reaches into her polished boot and produces a small package, which she offers to you.{/n} "Every gemstone needs a setting. I'm no fancy ring, shereen. A tiny gold one at most. You, on the other hand..." {n}Jae smiles mysteriously and takes a sip of her fragrant drink.{/n}

{n}She reaches into her polished boot and produces a small package, which she offers to you.{/n} "True jewels are meant to be held in the hands of the worthiest, shereen. Please, accept this humble gift." {n}Jae smiles mysteriously and takes a sip of her fragrant drink.{/n}

languages.text: {n}她将手伸进了擦得锃亮的靴子里，掏出了一个小小的包裹，递给你。{/n}“真正的珠宝，只属于真正有价值的人，亲爱的。请收下这件卑微的礼物吧。”{n}婕伊神秘地笑了笑，抿了一口她香气四溢的饮料。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She reaches into her polished boot and produces a small package, which she offers to you.{/n} "True jewels are meant to be held in the hands of the worthiest, shereen. Please, accept this humble gift." {n}Jae smiles mysteriously and takes a sip of her fragrant drink.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}她将手伸进了擦得锃亮的靴子里，掏出了一个小小的包裹，递给你。{/n}“真正的珠宝，只属于真正有价值的人，亲爱的。请收下这件卑微的礼物吧。”{n}婕伊神秘地笑了笑，抿了一口她香气四溢的饮料。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lleva la mano a su bota pulida y saca de ella un pequeño paquete que después te ofrece.{/n} «Las auténticas joyas son para las manos de los dignos, shereen. Por favor, acepte este humilde regalo». {n}Jae esboza una sonrisa misteriosa y da un sorbo a su fragante bebida.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She reaches into her polished boot and produces a small package, which she offers to you.{/n} "True jewels are meant to be held in the hands of the worthiest, shereen. Please, accept this humble gift." {n}Jae smiles mysteriously and takes a sip of her fragrant drink.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lleva la mano a su bota pulida y saca de ella un pequeño paquete que después te ofrece.{/n} «Las auténticas joyas son para las manos de los dignos, shereen. Por favor, acepte este humilde regalo». {n}Jae esboza una sonrisa misteriosa y da un sorbo a su fragante bebida.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ジェイはピカピカのブーツに手を突っこむと、小さな小包を取り出す。{/n}「本物の宝石は誰より立派なお方の手に渡る運命なのさ、シャリーン。ちょっとした贈り物よ、受け取って」{n}ジェイは意味ありげな微笑を浮かべ、香り高いドリンクを一口飲む。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She reaches into her polished boot and produces a small package, which she offers to you.{/n} "True jewels are meant to be held in the hands of the worthiest, shereen. Please, accept this humble gift." {n}Jae smiles mysteriously and takes a sip of her fragrant drink.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイはピカピカのブーツに手を突っこむと、小さな小包を取り出す。{/n}「本物の宝石は誰より立派なお方の手に渡る運命なのさ、シャリーン。ちょっとした贈り物よ、受け取って」{n}ジェイは意味ありげな微笑を浮かべ、香り高いドリンクを一口飲む。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elle glisse la main dans sa botte cirée et en retire un petit paquet qu'elle vous tend.{/n} « Les joyaux les plus précieux trouvent leur place entre les mains des plus dignes, shereen. Je vous prie d'accepter ce modeste cadeau. » {n}Avec un sourire mystérieux, Jae avale une gorgée de sa boisson odorante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She reaches into her polished boot and produces a small package, which she offers to you.{/n} "True jewels are meant to be held in the hands of the worthiest, shereen. Please, accept this humble gift." {n}Jae smiles mysteriously and takes a sip of her fragrant drink.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle glisse la main dans sa botte cirée et en retire un petit paquet qu'elle vous tend.{/n} « Les joyaux les plus précieux trouvent leur place entre les mains des plus dignes, shereen. Je vous prie d'accepter ce modeste cadeau. » {n}Avec un sourire mystérieux, Jae avale une gorgée de sa boisson odorante.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sie greift in ihren polierten Stiefel und holt ein kleines Päckchen heraus, das sie dir reicht.{/n} "Echte Juwelen gehören in die Hände der Würdigsten, Shereen. Bitte nehmt dieses bescheidene Geschenk an." {n}Jae lächelt geheimnisvoll und nippt an ihrem duftenden Drink.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She reaches into her polished boot and produces a small package, which she offers to you.{/n} "True jewels are meant to be held in the hands of the worthiest, shereen. Please, accept this humble gift." {n}Jae smiles mysteriously and takes a sip of her fragrant drink.{/n}

Please, accept this humble gift." {n}Jae smiles mysteriously and takes a sip of her fragrant drink.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae, cilalı çizmesine uzanıp içinden ufak bir paket çıkarıyor ve paketi sana uzatıyor.{/n} "Hakiki mücevherler, en kıymetli ellerde olmayı hak eder şirinim. Bu naçizane armağanı kabul et lütfen." {n}Jae, esrarengiz bir biçimde gülümseyip hoş kokulu içkisinden bir yudum alıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She reaches into her polished boot and produces a small package, which she offers to you.{/n} "True jewels are meant to be held in the hands of the worthiest, shereen. Please, accept this humble gift." {n}Jae smiles mysteriously and takes a sip of her fragrant drink.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, cilalı çizmesine uzanıp içinden ufak bir paket çıkarıyor ve paketi sana uzatıyor.{/n} "Hakiki mücevherler, en kıymetli ellerde olmayı hak eder şirinim. Bu naçizane armağanı kabul et lütfen." {n}Jae, esrarengiz bir biçimde gülümseyip hoş kokulu içkisinden bir yudum alıyor.{/n}
